text: Indian Central School (abbreviation: ICS) is a progressive Senior Secondary Public School affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education, Delhi. This School is also a member of the Council of CBSE affiliated schools in the Gulf and shares expertise in the cultural, literary and educational activities. ==History== Indian Central School started functioning on 31 August 1988. It was initially up to Class VIII to which Class IX was added in April 1997. First Board Batch of Class X appeared in the Board Examination in March 1999. Indian Central School is sponsored by the Dar Al-Salam Educational Services. It is recognized by the Ministry of Education. ==External links== *http://www.icskwt.com *https://web.archive.org/web/20110723001113/http://abbassiya.net/detail/18/ Category:Indian international schools in Kuwait Category:Private schools in Kuwait Category:1994 establishments in Kuwait Category:Educational institutions established in 1994
title: Indian Central School (Kuwait)
